name: Hedge Maze Hoodwink
description:
After exchanging letters, you're finally meeting your anonymous lover inside the hedge maze at sunset. Except you have to actually find them in this maze? And to make matters worse, you keep running into a homicidal stranger who doesn't seem to care how much of a rush you're in!

Created for O2A2 using:

  • <1,000 words by Cygni
  • 1 background by Kyle
  • 1 sprite by Florencia "Florisam" Sampietro

As well as:

  • 1 music track by Kevin Macleod
  • GUI from All-in-One GUI Template and Golden Disc GUI
Content Warnings (SPOILERS) Visual jump scares (click for details)

The sprite abruptly appears closely zoomed in a few times with no transitions and no SFX. This occurs three times when the narrator "turns around" or "turns a corner".

Historical catfishing, revenge, attempted murder, implied murder, implied exploitation of workers.
